intro.paragraph: Every successful brand begins with clarity. I guide you through a structured process that uncovers your purpose, aligns your message, and creates design that truly resonates.

profile.paragraphOne: For the past 7 years I‚Äôve been helping entrepreneurs, retreat & wellness centers, and small businesses build brands that feel authentic, look distinctive, and work beautifully online.
profile.paragraphTwo: My approach combines strategic thinking with clean, emotional design ‚Äî so your audience instantly understands who you are and why you matter.

howIWork.heading: That‚Äôs how I
howIWork.paragraph: Every project follows a transparent, strategic process designed to uncover clarity and deliver lasting results.

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: We define your purpose, audience, and message. This step builds the strategic foundation your brand needs ‚Äî clear positioning, meaningful storytelling, and a direction that actually moves you forward.

design.title: Design
design.description: Your brand identity takes shape: logo, colors, typography, visual system. Everything is crafted to reflect your purpose and create instant recognition.

deliver.title: Deliver
deliver.description: We turn strategy and design into a ready-to-launch digital experience. Your website becomes clear, intuitive, emotional ‚Äî and aligned with your long-term goals.

paragraphOne.start: Every project is an opportunity to create something that not only looks beautiful but also

virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.solution: Designed an intuitive virtual museum experience with thoughtful UX that honors the content while making it discoverable.
virtuelles-fastnachtsmuseum.result: An accessible digital archive that preserves cultural heritage and reaches audiences beyond physical museum limitations.

seo.title: Retreat Center Branding & Website ‚Äî Brisa Bah√≠a Case Study
seo.description: Complete brand transformation including new name, logo, identity and retreat-focused website for a hidden retreat center in Colombia.

hero.title: Brisa Bah√≠a ‚Äî Retreat Center Rebrand & Website
hero.subtitle: Brand Strategy ¬∑ Visual Identity ¬∑ UX Design ¬∑ Website Development

intro.heading: A Hidden Retreat Center Gets a New Identity
intro.text1: Brisa Bah√≠a is a retreat center on Colombia's secluded Caribbean coast. When I joined the project, the center was still operating under its old name ‚Äî Bah√≠a Lodge ‚Äî with outdated branding and a website that attracted backpackers instead of retreat facilitators.
intro.text2: My role was to rename the center, develop a complete brand identity, and build a website that positions Brisa Bah√≠a as a premium destination for yoga teachers, wellness practitioners, and conscious travelers.
intro.services: Naming, Branding, Logo, Web Design, Development

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.text: The old 'Bah√≠a Lodge' brand communicated budget accommodation, not transformative retreat experiences. There was no visual identity, no clear positioning for facilitators, and the website was cluttered and confusing. The center needed a complete transformation to attract the right audience.

goal.heading: The Goal
goal.text1: Create a new name, brand identity, and website that express what Brisa Bah√≠a truly is ‚Äî a nature-connected sanctuary for retreat facilitators seeking an authentic, peaceful space to host transformative experiences.
goal.text2: The digital presence had to feel like the retreat itself: warm, natural, grounded, and deeply meaningful.

process.heading: The Process
process.subtitle: A structured approach from naming to launch.

step1.title: 1. Naming & Brand Strategy
step1.text: We began with deep research into the retreat's values, target audience, and competitive landscape. Through collaborative sessions, we discovered 'Brisa Bah√≠a' ‚Äî meaning 'Bay Breeze' ‚Äî a name that captures the coastal location and the feeling of peaceful escape.

step2.title: 2. Visual Identity System
step2.text: The new identity needed to capture the essence of Brisa Bah√≠a: coastal breezes, tropical nature, and the feeling of grounded tranquility. Every element was designed to work together as a cohesive system that reflects the retreat's positioning.

step3.title: 3. UX Structure & Website
step3.text: We redesigned the entire information architecture to clearly communicate offerings for facilitators: hosting retreats, facilities, food, accommodation, and the inquiry process. The website was built mobile-first with emotional storytelling.

branding.colorsBefore: Before: Limited palette with no cohesion
branding.colorsAfter: After: Warm, natural tones from the Colombian coast
branding.typography: Elegant serif headlines for warmth, clean sans-serif for readability

results.heading: The Results
results.subtitle: A complete transformation of the digital presence.
items: New name that captures the retreat's essence
Cohesive brand identity that stands out
Website traffic increased immediately after launch
First retreat inquiries through the new site

testimonial.quote: Jan understood exactly what we needed. He didn't just design a logo ‚Äî he helped us find our identity. The new name, the brand, the website ‚Äî everything feels like us now. Facilitators tell us the website is what convinced them to reach out.
testimonial.author: Mar√≠a & David

gallery.heading: Brand Guidelines & Assets
gallery.subtitle: A comprehensive brand system delivered with full guidelines for consistent application.

cta.heading: Ready to Transform Your Retreat's Presence?
cta.text: If you're building a retreat center or wellness space and want a brand and website that clearly communicate your vision, let's talk.
